1.0.5.name: wordpress/wp-version
1.0.5.description:
In some wordpress projects, customisation is an real IT developement project and not only a theme changing or plugin management. This plugin allow you to manage and show on your footer the website version number currently running.

This number is NOT the Wordpress version number.
